mapper.select: SELECT bankCard.id id, bankCard.user_no userNo, customer.name name, customer.mobile mobile, customer.cert_type certType, customer.cert_no certNo, bankCard.bank_id bankId, bankCard.card_no cardNo, bankCard.area area, customer.create_time createTime, customer.modify_time modifyTime FROM `t_gq_fss_bank_card_info` bankCard ,`t_gq_fss_customer` customer where bankCard.user_no=customer.id
